question: Recently after taraweeh, shafai imam led the witr prayer. He said he will do witr with one salam with no sitting in 2nd rakat
answer:
QUESTION
I am a hanafi. Recently after taraweeh, shafai imam led the witr prayer. He said he will do witr with one salam with no sitting in 2nd rakat i.e with no tashaud and qunot after rukuh of 3rd rakah. Is my witr valid or do i have to repeat the witr as in hanafi fiqh, sittiing in tashaud is Wajib in 2nd rakah.

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

The witr was not valid, it has to be repeated.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
